query.formula: strategy opt = minE(globalTime + penalty)[<=MAXTIME]{movement0.location, taskExe0.location, movement1.location, taskExe1.location, movement2.location, taskExe2.location, iteration[0], iteration[1], iteration[2], tf[0][0],tf[0][1],tf[0][2],tf[0][3],tf[1][0],tf[1][1],tf[1][2],tf[1][3],tf[2][0],tf[2][1],tf[2][2],tf[2][3]}->{}:<> ((forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i]>=MaxIteration))
